channel.title: Static Resources :: Java Web Development
channel.description: Up to now, we used templates to display controller data as text in the view. If we need to display an image or video, or if we want to create a link to a different file, then we need to move beyond a text output. With Thymeleaf, we can set values for the HTML src and href attributes. Instead of hard-coding a file path or external URL inside a tag, th:src and th:href take advantage of a simpler syntax.
